listitem.para: LOCALE: spanish translation
SHADOWWORLD: races and cultures
NPC: generator creates more different characters with typical skills for the profession
BASIC: range description for weapons depends on length unit now
BASIC: divine status and fate points support
PDF: Character image can be printed on PDF page 1 (bottom right corner) and on the PDF page 4 (equpipment page). It is configurable per character.
UI: A button to delete the character image
BASIC: Fix Length unit format (feet/inch was f"i')
BASIC: removed height/weight todo (it is not necessary anymore, due to the default values)
BASIC: Penalty special bonus for skills and categories possible
LEVEL-UP MODE: Fixed spell list DP cost increasing (First 5 spell lists 1x DP cost, next 5 lists 2xDP costs, ..)
PDF: Weight penalty can't be lower than 0 anymore
NPC: Appearence diced with pot PR - 25 + 5d10
LOCALE: Fix several typos (english)
BASIC: Non-metric unit system support: lbs for weight and feet/inches for lengths
GENERATOR: NPC generator improvement. Better DP distribution on skill categories and weapons
UI: Nice-up characteristic and basic panel
UI: Armor penalties are displayed at basic panel
UI: You can decide print or hide the outline image each character
UI: Magical items are favorite by default, now
UI: PDF creation dialog contains the file name + pdf extension (of the saved file)
Localization: Translated maneuver strings on PDF combat sheet
Localization: Some typos fixed
BASIC: Fixed Adding a modified skill without modifying the rank caused several internal errors
BASIC: More information (for developer) on the error message
PDF: Fixed error while generating PDF
PDF: Fixed error ClassCastException while generating PDF [&typeBug; 3472299]
PDF: remove white background from outline images to avoid light-yellow background shine in PDF
PDF: If there are to many skills for one page they are distributed on multiple pages
UI: Fix Level-Up overlay icon after sorting the skill and skill category table
UI: Fix After sorting the skills table edit will edit the correct skill
UI: Fix magical item bonus updating in the skill list
UI: Make the favorite check box behavior more clear (new label text)
BASIC: Saved characters can be opened with Java 7
BASIC: Youth ranks are added correctly [&typeBug; 3467482]
BASIC: Saved characters from older RMO versions can be opened now
Equipment panel: Magical items can be added to the character. (see readme) [&typeFeature; 3408076]
Stat panel: Add buttons for dice and distribute just all temp stats and pot stats
PDF: Initiative is printed out on combat status (PDF page 6)
PDF: Outline image is printed out on combat status (PDF page 6), to hide the image check your preferences (see readme)
Core: DP costs of spell lists depend on the rank and spell user type
Core: DP costs of spell list ranks increases every 5 ranks by default, the factor is configurable (see readme)
UI: A progress bar is shown while generating the PDF. If successful the PDF will be opened otherwise an error message is shown.
UI: Several improvements in the UI behavior (weapon cost layout, icons, button enabling/disabled)
UI: configuration file path is displayed in the about dialog
NPC-Generator: After skill rank increasing, the skill category's rank will be increased from 0 to 1 if enough DP points left
The magic realm cannot be unselected anymore and is filled by default after race and profession selected step
After NPC generation only the spell lists with ranks are shown in list
Look and Feel for Windows is now PlasticXP by default
NPC-Generator distributes hobby and spell list ranks
New panel Coins and other riches (in equipment tab)
Improved equipment table behavior: 1-Click editable
Tech/Trade - Vocational and Tech/Trade - Professional translation were switched [&typeBug; 3406355]
Improve Windows start file [&typeBug; 3324203]
English translation for shields and some armor types
Name generator had some wrong syllables
Text color of the todo panel is now set to black for skin/themes with white text color
NPC character sheet layout was broken in some cases
Error in PDF (Movement was not visible with Acrobat Reader)
Barbarian rune on PDF was missing
Replaces rune images with new designed runes for cultures and professions
Professions, races, training packages, skills, spell lists can be excluded by source (see README)
Support for arcane companion professions with 4 stats
Most training package completed with time to aquire, start money, type and source
Latest version check at startup

Character generator generates: [&typeFeature; 3106764]
stats (temp/pot/gain)
characteristics (weight/height/appearance)
skills, skill categories, spelllists
PDF for NPCs with most imported values on one page
Selecting the race or culture will set the average weight and height
fixed skill category resolution for arcane spells
Weapons-Artillery has now switchable weapons costs
missing +30 heat resistance for orcs
rank can be learned over 100
Add spell lists from elemental Companion, arcane Companion, essence companion, mentalismn companion, channeling companion
Add dummy spell lists for alchemists
Localize spell lists
Middleearth Culture Youth Ranks: Long Bow was missing
Skills name and type can be edited now
Locale DE: fixed typo "Fernkampfabzug" on PDF
Gender is now printed on PDF correctly
Error on generating character name if not race was selected
Body Development profession bonus considered, now
Fixed PDF generation error on some weapon skills (e.g. Boxing)
error log configuration: ${user.home}/.rmoffice/error.log
Page 6 in PDF: Combat Status Sheet
Level-Up Button more visible
Page 5 in PDF: All skills with bonus
Level-Up support that limits the rank operations and calculates the development points left for this level
Add image to Done-Button (in ToDo-Panel)
Skill ranks can be increased by 0.5 if restricted, 1 by default, 2 if everyman, 3 if occupational
Additional information pages can be added with custom title and text. The font size is decreased until the text fits to the page. The text will be cut if the font size must be under 2.5 points
most of weapon translations (to english)
selection color for JSpinner table cell editor
On opening a saved character the development points are be updated now
A skill can not be added a second time anymore
Background options and Exhaustion Points are now read from race.conf correctly
Race exhaustion points are considered
fixed costs for skills in skill category Resistance
remove duplicate skill 246 (will be replaced by 299)
108 professions (including over 50 priests)
198 training packs
PDF is created dynamically (areas for skills, spells, arms, equipment is sized dynamically)
weight penalty
localization for english and german
stats gain dialog
potential stat dialog
stat gain and potential stat dice is displayed
stat panel: arrow down/up to go to next stat field
Increase Line height in skill table and skill group table for MacOS LnF
